title: Chiefs-Chargers MNF Preview, Could Fangio be one-and-done in Denver? (Football 11/18)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jared Dubin to preview Chiefs vs. Chargers from Mexico City on Monday Night Football (3:30). The guys break down how the location could play a role in the outcome, how injuries might impact the game, Patrick Mahomes' improvement and Philip Rivers' regression before discussing player props and giving their picks. Then, Jason La Canfora joins the podcast (32:15) to discuss Vic Fangio's future in Denver (34:00), Marvin Lewis possibly getting back into the league as a head coach (45:30), Mitchell Trubisky's apparent benching (56:00) and details on the potential new CBA that would drastically change the league (58:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson is joined by Jared Dubin to preview Chiefs-Chargers and by Jason La Canfora to discuss takeaways from Week 11.
